ingredientStatement.text: Ingredients: Tomato Puree (Water, Tomato Paste), Cream, Vodka, Garlic, Sugar, Canola Oil, Ricotta Cheese (Milk, Whey, Distilled Vinegar, Salt), Contains Less Than 1% Of: Salt, Romano Cheese (Cultured Part Skim Cow's Milk, Salt, Enzymes), Citric Acid, Parmesan Cheese (Part Skim Milk, Cultures, Salt, Enzymes), Black Pepper, Oregano, Flavoring.

productText.text: Enjoy the flavor of cream, vine-ripened tomatoes and Parmesan Cheese!

productText.text: Use as an ingredient or shortcut for dishes your family will love

productText.text: Prego® Creamy Vodka Italian Sauce combines cream, vine-ripened tomatoes and Parmesan cheese. You'll love it over pasta or with favorite dishes.
productText.textHTML: Prego® Creamy Vodka Italian Sauce combines cream, vine-ripened tomatoes and Parmesan cheese. You'll love it over pasta or with favorite dishes.

productText.text: Prego® Creamy Vodka Italian Sauce combines cream, vine-ripened tomatoes and Parmesan cheese. This delicious sauce will be sure to please everyone in the family. It's a great choice for pasta or with your own family-pleasing recipes.
productText.textHTML: Prego® Creamy Vodka Italian Sauce combines cream, vine-ripened tomatoes and Parmesan cheese. This delicious sauce will be sure to please everyone in the family. It's a great choice for pasta or with your own family-pleasing recipes.

productText.text: Prego® Italian sauces are made with sweet vine-ripened tomatoes and savory herbs and seasonings you can taste in every bite. Whether you’re in the mood for a zesty tomato sauce or a rich, creamy Alfredo sauce—Prego brings irresistible taste your whole family will love.
